de.upb.pcm.interpreter.utils

Class ModelHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.upb.pcm.interpreter.utils.ModelHelper

  • public class ModelHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper to access the pcm model (global and local), the prm model, the pms model and all sdm models.
    Author:
    Joachim Meyer

      • getLocalPCMModels

        public PCMModels getLocalPCMModels(de.uka.ipd.sdq.simucomframework.abstractSimEngine.SimProcess simProcess)
        Returns local pcm models for the given sim process. If none exists a local copy will be created. If simulated user repeats interaction with the system within the sim process, a fresh copy will created.
        Parameters:
        simProcess - the sim process.
        Returns:
        the local pcm models for the sim process.

        public boolean sdmModelsExists()
        Checks whether sdm models exists, without using any classes from sd interpreter.
